description.value: The Melfesh Monster sprays flaming gas in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] or a @Template[type:line|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take [[/r 4d6[fire]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true|name:Flame Lash] save). This ability replaces the firelance ranged Strike.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Monsters of Myth
